org.openimaj.image.colour

Class RGBColour

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.colour.RGBColour

  • public class RGBColour
extends Object
    Convenience constants and methods for RGB colours for use in MBFImages
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • fromColor

        public static Float[] fromColor(Color c)
        Make an OpenImaj colour from a java.awt.Color.
        Parameters:
        c - the color to convert
        Returns:
        a colour for using as RGB MBFImages

      • fromString

        public static Float[] fromString(String s)
        Get a colour from a string representation. The string may contain any of the predefined colour names described in this class (in upper, lower or mixed case), or it can be a comma separated triplet of floating point values.
        Parameters:
        s - the string
        Returns:
        the colour described by the string, or BLACK if a problem occurs.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • RGB

        public static Float[] RGB(int r,
          int g,
          int b)
        Create a colour from an RGB triplet with integer values in the range 0..255.
        Parameters:
        r - red value 0..255
        g - green value 0..255
        b - blue value 0..255
        Returns:
